name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Introduction to Aerodynamics
lessons.description: An overview of the fundamental principles of aerodynamics and how they are applied in various fields.

lessons.name: Airflow and Pressure
lessons.description: Detailed analysis of how air moves around objects, including concepts of pressure and boundary layers.

lessons.name: Aerodynamic Forces
lessons.description: Examination of lift, drag, and thrust forces in aerodynamics with practical examples.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Fundamentals of Subsonic Flow
lessons.description: Exploration of flow characteristics at speeds less than the speed of sound, including boundary layer theory and pressure distributions.

lessons.name: Introduction to Supersonic Flow
lessons.description: An introductory look at the phenomena associated with flow speeds exceeding the speed of sound, including shock waves and expansion fans.

lessons.name: Advanced Dynamics in Supersonic Flight
lessons.description: Detailed study of supersonic flight dynamics, focusing on aircraft design, stability, and control at high speeds.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Principles of Aerodynamic Heating
lessons.description: Covers the basic principles of aerodynamic heating, including the sources and mechanisms of heat generation in high-speed flight.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Technologies
lessons.description: Introduction to the various thermal protection systems used in aerospace, focusing on materials and design approaches to mitigate heating effects.

lessons.name: Case Studies in Aerodynamic Heating
lessons.description: Analyzes several case studies of aerodynamic heating challenges and solutions in modern aerospace engineering, including re-entry vehicles and hypersonic aircraft.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Introduction to Spacecraft Structures
lessons.description: Overview of spacecraft structural design, including key considerations and structural requirements in spacecraft engineering.

lessons.name: Materials for Spacecraft
lessons.description: Detailed discussion on the selection of materials for spacecraft, focusing on the properties required for space environment resilience.

lessons.name: Designing for Space Environment
lessons.description: Explores the challenges and methodologies of designing spacecraft structures specifically for the harsh conditions of space.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Basics of Orbital Mechanics
lessons.description: Introduction to the fundamental concepts of orbital mechanics, including Newton's laws of motion and universal gravitation.

lessons.name: Orbital Transfers and Maneuvers
lessons.description: Detailed study of orbital transfer techniques, such as Hohmann transfers and bi-elliptic transfers, and other orbital maneuvers.

lessons.name: Mission Planning and Design
lessons.description: Focuses on the practical aspects of designing space missions, including trajectory analysis, mission sequencing, and payload integration.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Introduction to Spacecraft Systems
lessons.description: An introductory overview of the various systems within a spacecraft, including structural, propulsion, and electrical systems.

lessons.name: Spacecraft Subsystems Integration
lessons.description: Focuses on the integration of various subsystems within a spacecraft, detailing the interdependencies and coordination needed for successful operation.

lessons.name: Systems Engineering Processes
lessons.description: Discusses the key processes in systems engineering, such as requirements definition, system design, implementation, and verification, with a focus on spacecraft applications.
